docs.abstract: Jonas, Steven (Dr): Medical Mystery. The Training of Doctors in the United States revd by Dr Michael Halberstam (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: THIS earnest, repetitious book manages to encompass all that is wrong with contemporary American medicine. It does so by detailing most of the problems and then topping them off with the author's magnificently wrong-headed suggestions for "reform."
docs.snippet: THIS earnest, repetitious book manages to encompass all that is wrong with contemporary American medicine. It does so by detailing  most of the problems and then topping them off with the author's magnificently wrong-headed suggestions for "reform."

headline.main: Books of The Times Running in Good Health; A Dashing Person

docs.abstract: Sportsmedicine Book, The (Book): By Dr Gabe Mirkin and Marshall Hoffman revd by Anatole Broyard (M)
docs.lead_paragraph: For 16.5 million Americans, the pursuit of happiness is being carried out in track shoes. People who despair of the head are turning to the body. They are flushing out their anxieties with the circulation...
